sentences.en: After the WTO accession, China will further improve its market climate.
sentences.cn: 加入世界贸易组织后, 中国将进一步改善市场环境.

sentences.en: China's WTO accession is the landmark of the beginning of all - round opening - up .
sentences.cn: 以加入WTO为标志,中国基本形成 全方位 的 对外开放 格局.

sentences.en: Chinas WTO accession has an influence to educational training of union cadres.
sentences.cn: 我国加入WTO,对工会干部教育培训工作的影响,有个渐进的、从量变到质变的发展过程.

sentences.en: CTX - M - 29 is a novel ESBLs and the GenBank accession number is AY 267213.
sentences.cn: CTX -M-29 是一种新基因型ESBLs,基因库登录号为AY267213.

sentences.en: Despite so, China undertook enormous commitments in its accession to the WTO.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 中国在加入世贸组织时仍然做出了巨大的承诺.

sentences.en: He inherited vast estates on his accession to the throne.
sentences.cn: 他即位后继承了大片领地.

sentences.en: He legitimated his accession to the estate.
sentences.cn: 他使他的承继产业合法化.

sentences.en: Instruments of ratification and accession shall be deposited with the Director General.
sentences.cn: 批准书和加入书应递交总干事保存.

sentences.en: On his accession to the throne, he inherited vast estates.
sentences.cn: 他一登上王位就继承了大宗财产.

sentences.en: On that day, the realm of France received on parchment a stupendous accession.
sentences.cn: 那一天, 法国的领土在羊皮纸的文件上获得了绝大的扩张.

sentences.en: the accession of Queen Victoria to the throne
The product can be long as the accession to paint.
sentences.cn: 该产品只要加入涂料即可.

sentences.en: There will be ceremonies to mark the tenth anniversary of the Queen's accession.
sentences.cn: 将有典礼以庆祝女王就位10周年.

sentences.en: This event occurred just at the accession of Henry the first.
sentences.cn: 这事件恰好发生在亨利一世即位的时候.

sentences.en: WTO accession for China's construction enterprise opportunities as well as challenges.
sentences.cn: 留学解答资讯网:入世,对于我国建筑企业是机遇也是挑战.

words.tran_cn: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的

trans.tran_cn: 增加，就职，增加物，（对同盟、国际条约等的）正式加入
trans.tran_en: an official process in which someone becomes king, queen, president etc
